design_audit.strata_or_blocks: subject (within-subject design: each subject faces all set sizes)

claim_object.outcome_concept: Fixation efficiency (quality of attention allocation to higher-rated items)
claim_object.treatment_concept: Set size of choice alternatives (4 vs 9 vs 16 items)
claim_object.estimand_concept: Effect of choice set size on efficiency of initial fixations
claim_object.target_population: Laboratory subjects in eye-tracking snack food choice experiment

baseline_specs.label: Stats-2A-efficiency-by-setsize
baseline_specs.notes: Within-subject means collapsed by (subject, numalt), then paired t-test across conditions

constraints.notes: Within-subject experimental design with no controls. All variation is within-subject across randomized conditions.

canonical.notes: Paired t-test on within-subject condition means, matching the paper's analysis

variants.notes: OLS with subject-clustered SEs as alternative to paired t-test
Robust SEs on pooled regression (ignoring within-subject correlation)
